players.name: Sachin Tendulkar
players.description: Sachin Ramesh Tendulkar is an Indian former international cricketer who served as captain of the Indian national team. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest batsmen in the history of cricket.

players.name: Mahendra Singh Dhoni
players.description: Mahendra Singh Dhoni, is a former Indian international cricketer who captained the Indian national team in limited-overs formats from 2007 to 2017 and in Test cricket from 2008 to 2014.

players.name: Virat Kohli
players.description: Virat Kohli is an Indian cricketer and the current captain of the India national team. A right-handed top-order batsman, Kohli is regarded as one of the best contemporary batsmen in the world.

players.name: Jasprit Bumrah
players.description: Jasprit Jasbirsingh Bumrah is an Indian international cricketer, who plays for the Indian national cricket team in all formats of the game.A right arm fast bowler, he consistently bowls at around 145-150 kph.

players.name: AB de Villiers
players.description: Abraham Benjamin AB de Villiers is a South African cricketer. de Villiers was named as the ICC ODI Player of the Year three times during his 15-year international career and was one of the five wisden.

players.name: Ricky Ponting
players.description: Ricky Thomas Ponting AO is an Australian cricket coach, commentator, and former cricketer. He is considered one of the most successful captains in international cricket history, with 220 victories in 324 matches with a winning ratio of 67.91%.

players.name: Kane Williamson
players.description: Kane Stuart Williamson is a New Zealand international cricketer who is currently the captain of the New Zealand national team in all formats. He is a right-handed batsman and an occasional off spin bowler. Williamson made his first-class cricket debut in December 2007.

players.name: Cristiano Ronaldo
players.description: Cristiano Ronaldo dos Santos Aveiro GOIH ComM is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a forward for Serie A club Juventus and captains the Portugal national team.

players.name: Lionel Messi
players.description: Lionel Andrés Messi is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward and captains both Spanish club Barcelona and the Argentina national team.

players.name: Neymar
players.description: Neymar da Silva Santos Júnior, known as Neymar, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Ligue 1 club Paris Saint-Germain and the Brazil national team. He is widely regarded as one of the best players in the world.

players.name: Sergio Ramos
players.description: Sergio Ramos García is a Spanish professional footballer who plays as a centre-back and captains both La Liga club Real Madrid and the Spanish national team. He has also played as a right-back earlier in his career.

players.name: Robert Lewandowski
players.description: Robert Lewandowski is a Polish professional footballer who plays as a striker for Bundesliga club Bayern Munich and is the captain of the Poland national team.

players.name: Sunil Chhetri
players.description: Sunil Chhetri is an Indian professional footballer who plays as a striker or winger and captains both the Indian Super League side Bengaluru FC and the Indian national football team.

players.name: LeBron James
players.description: LeBron Raymone James Sr. is an American professional basketball player for the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball Association. Widely considered one of the greatest NBA players in history, James is frequently compared to Michael Jordan in debates over the greatest basketball player of all time.

players.name: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
players.description: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar is an American former professional basketball player who played 20 seasons in the National Basketball Association for the Milwaukee Bucks and the Los Angeles Lakers.

players.name: Michael Jordan
players.description: Michael Jeffrey Jordan, also known by his initials MJ, is an American businessman and former professional basketball player. He is the principal owner and chairman of the Charlotte Hornets of the National Basketball Association and of 23XI Racing in the NASCAR Cup Series

players.name: Kobe Bryant
players.description: Kobe Bean Bryant was an American professional basketball player. A shooting guard, he spent his entire 20-year career with the Los Angeles Lakers in the National Basketball Association.

players.name: Magic Johnson
players.description: Earvin Magic Johnson Jr. is an American former professional basketball player and former president of basketball operations of the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball Association.

players.name: Surender Kumar
players.description: Surender Kumar is an Indian field hockey player, who plays as a defender for the Indian national team. He was part of the national team that participated in the 2016 Summer Olympics. He is from Karnal, Haryana.

players.name: Krishan Pathak
players.description: Krishan Bahadur Pathak is an Indian field hockey player who plays as a goalkeeper for the Indian national team.

players.name: Dhyan Chand
players.description: Major Dhyan Chand was an Indian field hockey player widely regarded as the greatest in the history of the sport. He was known for his extraordinary goal-scoring feats, in addition to earning three Olympic gold medals, in 1928, 1932 and 1936, during an era where India dominated field hockey

players.name: Manpreet Singh
players.description: Manpreet Singh Pawar is an Indian field hockey player and the captain of India men's national field hockey team since May 2017. He plays as a halfback. He first played for India in 2011 at the age of 19. He represented India at the 2012 Summer Olympics and was named Asia's Junior Player of the Year in 2014.

players.name: P.R.Sreejesh
players.description: Parattu Raveendran Sreejesh is an Indian professional field hockey player who plays as a goalkeeper and former captain of the Indian national team. In the Hockey India League, he plays for Uttar Pradesh Wizards.
